about_the_game:
Earth is now ruled by dragons, the last humans live in underground shelters, is up to Europa, Sofia, Claire and Virginia to defy the gods and save the world!
More than 90% of the mankind was killed by the Gods of Infinity, beings that now live in Earth as dragons.
The remaing survivals are building their own weapon, a Dragonslayer Mech, but in a wrecked world, such thing isn't a easy matter...

The demo version is limited to the first three bosses and only the initial map.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of violence and instances of nudity.
